Case Study: ROI Prioritization

"Which Tech Project Will
Actually Make Us Money?"

A business with a dozen ideas, a limited budget, and a paralyzing fear of choosing the wrong one. They had the ambition, but they lacked the math to back it up.

The Reality
The Client's Reality

Paralyzed by choice.
Afraid of the cost.

The client wasn’t short on ideas—they had too many. They had a dozen potential tech improvements on the table, from AI integration to CRM overhauls, but no way to measure their impact.

No Clear Winner

Without a framework to measure value, every idea looked equally "important," making prioritization impossible.

The Fear of Waste

They knew one wrong move could burn their quarterly budget with zero return to show for it.

New CRM Integration?
AI Chatbot?
Cloud Migration
App Refactor
Automate Billing?
1

Intake

01 / 10

Idea Overload Intake

Collected all proposed projects and clarified core business outcomes the client wanted.

Learn more about this phase
// Mission Accomplished

Absolute Clarity.
Measurable Returns.

The paralysis vanished. Armed with our roadmap, the client confidently invested in the #1 ranked project on the list—an intelligent automation workflow.

They didn't just "hope" it would work. They knew the math. The system was deployed, and exactly as projected, they hit their ROI targets in record time.
